Text: Thanks man, downloaded pretty fast. Seeding!
How do I install the lp part?

First load whatever version of iTunes you have 

Navigate to the itlp folder (make sure you don't rename any of the files in there) and drop the "Random Access Memories - iTunes LP.itlp" file into iTunes.

Once it's there it should show up as a playlist item, double click on it and it should show up as kind of interactive digital booklet thing.
